sentences.sContent: I can't speak English fluently as I am out of practice.
sentences.sContent_eng: I can't speak English fluently as I am out of practice.
sentences.sCn: 我不能流利地说英语， 因为我已荒疏了。

sentences.sContent: We should train our students to speak English fluently and accurately.
sentences.sContent_eng: We should train our students to speak English fluently and accurately.
sentences.sCn: 我们应培养学生流利而准确地讲英语。

sentences.sContent: ...is fine-people banging away on their smartphones are fluently using a code separate from the one they use in actual writing...

words.tran: 流畅的，流利的；液态的；畅流的
